snippet.title: Slender Man Downpour - A NEW FREE Slender Man game!
snippet.description:
You don't see Slender in the video because I wanted the video to be spoiler free.
 This game can be downloaded from the following link:   
http://www.freefilehosting.net/slendermandownpourv3

Controls: 
Use your mouse to look around.
Use the  W,A,S,D keys to walk, or the arrow keys
Left mouse button to select and pick up items.
Hold any of the Shift keys to run.
Press the "F" key to turn your flashlight on or off.
Press the Spacebar to jump


See more of my games @ http://sonicblack.co.nr
